itunes:title: Episode 882 - LIVE From The "Field Of Dreams"
title: Episode 882 - LIVE From The "Field Of Dreams"
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson takes his father to Iowa for the first annual "Field Of Dreams" game in Iowa and sits down with Dwier Brown who played the father in the movie in front of the actual house they filmed in, and afterwards they share a catch on the field itse...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson takes his father to Iowa for the first annual "Field Of Dreams" game in Iowa and sits down with Dwier Brown who played the father in the movie in front of the actual house they filmed in, and afterwards they share a catch on the field itself.  Surreal experience for anyone who has shared a special moment with their father.

description:
Ross Patterson takes his father to Iowa for the first annual "Field Of Dreams" game in Iowa and sits down with Dwier Brown who played the father in the movie in front of the actual house they filmed in, and afterwards they share a catch on the field itself.  Surreal experience for anyone who has shared a special moment with their father.
